thread.section_title: Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand | acerentalcars.co.nz
thread.title: Sandra Caley
thread.title_full: Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand reviewed by Sandra Caley

author: Sandra Caley
title: Sandra Caley
text:
Our hire was trouble free, the car was clean, the staff were efficient. The only problem was we couldn't get an airport drop-off at 7.30am. Apart from that, I'd recommend Ace to anyone.
However something I noted was a hire to some Japanese tourists. There was a very helpful road video playing in the office displaying our road rules etc which I watched but these tourists never looked at it once. I think it should have been compulsory viewing for any arriving tourists before they are allowed to hire a car. They should also have to prove they have been in the country for at least 24 hours before their hire.
